title: Riot help with new client
body:
**WHY CANT I MINIMIZE THE CHAT SO I WONT HAVE IT UP  ALL THE TIME??**

KINDA LIKE THE FACEBOOK CHAT THAT GOES UP AND DOWN WHEN YOU NEED IT

ITS ANNOYING TO HAVE TO HAVE THE CHAT UP ALL THE TIME

http://i.imgur.com/D9N8XWX.jpg

replies.body: Hah, I initially thought this could be minimized but it looks to physically be a part of the updated client.  It's not something that you can currently hide, but if you have any feedback then let our devs know on the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Good luck!
